short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remix and enhance online audio instantly: slowed+reverb, nightcore, daycore, 8D effects, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Audio Magic Studio is a free, user-friendly browser extension that lets you instantly transform the audio from online videos and music streams into engaging, personalized sound experiences. With just a few clicks, you can slow down tracks and add reverb, speed them up, create immersive "8D" effects that pan the audio around your head, or use "nightcore" and "daycore" presets to change the vibe of any song. You can also fine-tune the speed, reverb, and pitch preservation settings or save your own custom presets and defaults. Audio Magic Studio turns any audio on the web into your own personal studioâ€”no downloading or complicated software required.
